name: R5-MolecularSequence-R4B-MolecularSequence
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 MolecularSequence into FHIR R4B

element.display: Representation of a molecular sequence

target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence` maps as Equivalent to R4B `MolecularSequence`

element.display: Contained, inline Resources

target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4B `MolecularSequence.contained`

element.display: The method for sequencing

target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence.device` maps as Equivalent to R4B `MolecularSequence.device`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `MolecularSequence.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`

element.display: What the molecular sequence is about, when it is not about the subject of record
Embedded file or a link (URL) which contains content to represent the sequence
Logical id of this artifact

target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `MolecularSequence.id`

element.display: Unique ID for this particular sequence

target.display: Unique ID for this particular sequence. This is a FHIR-defined id
target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4B `MolecularSequence.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4B `MolecularSequence.implicitRules`

element.display: Language of the resource content

target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `MolecularSequence.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred

element.display: Sequence that was observed
Metadata about the resource

target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4B `MolecularSequence.meta`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored

target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `MolecularSequence.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

element.display: Who should be responsible for test result

target.display: Who should be responsible for test result
target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence.performer` maps as Equivalent to R4B `MolecularSequence.performer`

element.display: A sequence defined relative to another sequence
Ways of identifying nucleotides or amino acids within a sequence
Changes in sequence from the starting sequence
End position of the edit on the starting sequence
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Allele in the starting sequence
Allele that was observed
Start position of the edit on the starting sequence
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Indicates the order in which the sequence should be considered when putting multiple 'relative' elements together
Indicates the nucleotide range in the composed sequence when multiple 'relative' elements are used together
A sequence used as starting sequence
Chromosome Identifier
Additional content defined by implementations
The genome assembly used for starting sequence, e.g. GRCh38
Unique id for inter-element referencing
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
sense | antisense
The reference sequence that represents the starting sequence
watson | crick
End position of the window on the starting sequence
Start position of the window on the starting sequence
Specimen used for sequencing

target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence.specimen` maps as Equivalent to R4B `MolecularSequence.specimen`

element.display: Subject this sequence is associated too
Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence.text` maps as Equivalent to R4B `MolecularSequence.text`

element.display: aa | dna | rna

target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence.type` maps as Equivalent to R4B `MolecularSequence.type` - type has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/sequence-type|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/sequence-type|4.3.0 (Equivalent)
